cwd.description: Current working directory used to resolve a relative target path.

flags.description: File system flag as defined in the [Node.js documentation](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_file_system_flags) and [open(2)](http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man2/open.2.html)

target_tmp.description: Location where to write the temporary uploaded file before it is copied into its final destination, default to "{tmpdir}/nikita_{YYMMDD}_{pid}_{rand}/{hash target}"
